name: 2nd International Conference of Multidisciplinary & Interdisciplinary Bioscience
content: 2nd International Conference of Multidisciplinary & Interdisciplinary Bioscience (MIBIO 2023) January 21-22, 2023, Virtual Conference https://mibio2023.org/ Scope 2nd International Conference of Multidisciplinary & Interdisciplinary Bioscience (MIBIO 2023) will provide Biological Sciences Research remains the ubiquitous realm in better human health and well being. Multidisciplinary and interdisciplinary Bioscience Research has been stressed for explicit scientific advancements. Impact publications for a wider outreach are ascertained. MIBIO 2023 represents the launch-pad forum for researchers, biologists, students, Scientists and Physicians in peer-reviewed podium encompassing Biological Sciences. The conference takes pleasure in inviting your peer Research for a fantabulous realm of rapport in the arena of multidisciplinary and interdisciplinary Life sciences. The area offers discussions with biomedical and environment impact assessors. This allows you to enlighten, enrich and rejuvenate the multitude of oneness in biological sciences. The wide realms of research addressing any of the significant developments in the above-mentioned broad areas are welcome. The conference invites researchers to submit in the pivotal areas of publication interests. Topics of interest Priority Research areas mentioned broadly specific regimes • Algorithms and Bioinformatics • Microbiology • Biotechnology • Immunology • Biochemistry • Bioinformatics • Computational Biology • Environmental Sciences • Marine Biology • Molecular Biology • Genetics • Biomedical Sciences • Industrial Biotechnology • Biophysics • Population Biology • Neurobiology • Plant Sciences • Physiology • Cell Biology • Conservation Biology • Ecology • Evolution • Animal Sciences • Applied Biosciences • Engineering and Data analytics with computational perspectives • Astrobiology • Biophysics • Pharmaceutical biology • Immunotechnology • Biogeochemical sciences • Climate Sciences • Biostatistics Advanced scenario in Biosciences and its significance • CRISPR (Clustered Regularly Interspaced Short Palindromic Repeats) Technology and Industrialization prospects: Scenario in Agriculture and Biomedical applications • Global warming and mitigation through bioscience perspectives • Future of renewable resources and Bioenergy: Commercialization • GMO (Genetically Modified Organisms) • Genetically modified crops: Patents and commercialization issues • Farming Technology: Agrobiologic insights and Agricultural engineering: Perspectives for global welfare • Food production Vs Population explosion • Need for Plant Clinical Trial Database : Limitations • Nature and Bioscience • Emerging infectious diseases and abatement strategies • How to address global warming and natural calamities • Food as medicine: Alternative medicine and evidence based traditional medicine • Origin of life: Existence against Survival of the fittest? • Money Vs Man • World health organization and wellbeing of the cosmos • Plantibiotics and actinomycetes in health • In vitro, in vivo, and in silico methodologies for incorporation of Art of living, creativity and emotional intelligence up gradation. Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by November 12, 2022\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by International Journal of Advances in Biology (IJAB) (Confirmed). Important Dates • Submission Deadline : November 12, 2022 • Authors Notification : November 30, 2022 • Registration & camera - Ready Paper Due : December 08, 2022 Contact Here's where you can reach us: mibio@mibio2023.org (or) mibioconfe@yahoo.com Submission link: https://mibio2023.org/submission/index.php
